thread.title: Twitter Is Losing It Over President Obama's Backwards Hat And Flip Flops
thread.title_full: Twitter Is Losing It Over President Obama's Backwards Hat And Flip Flops

author: Carly Ledbetter
title: Twitter Is Losing It Over President Obama's Backwards Hat And Flip Flops
text:
Twitter Is Losing It Over President Obama's Backwards Hat And Flip Flops As are we. 02/01/2017 10:35 am ET Carly Ledbetter Lifestyle Editor, The Huffington Post 
While the rest of the world goes up in flames, Barack and Michelle Obama are off on a well-deserved vacation. 
The two jettisoned to Palm Springs immediately after Donald Trump‚Äôs inauguration, and are now hanging out and soaking up some sun on billionaire Richard Branson‚Äôs private island in the British Virgin Islands. Obama appears the most relaxed we‚Äôve seen in years, as evidenced by his smile, shorts, flip-flops and, oh yeah, his backwards hat. I am not an undercover cop pic.twitter.com/VBXBtVETHT ‚Äî Trill Withers (@TylerIAm) February 1, 2017 
When photos of his relaxed look emerged, people on Twitter totally lost it: Obama really in the BVI in flip flops just chillin pic.twitter.com/k1zb1Z3bQ2 ‚Äî Amat Victoria Curam‡•ê (@BR_Nation) February 1, 2017 Just saw Obama in flip flops and a backwards hat‚Ä¶ just strolling (on IG).I think i might genuinely love those people. üò≠üò≠üò≠ ‚Äî Roe V Wave (@Steebie_K) February 1, 2017 Favourite headline of the day as I scroll through all the bad news."OBAMA IS VACATIONING WITH HIS HAT ON BACKWARDS" ‚Äî Ryan Donnelly (@ryan_donnelly88) February 1, 2017 Seeing Obama on vacation in flip flops with his hat to the back just brought me so much joy ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§ 
Some people jokingly took the hat as a sign the Obamas are never coming back: Obama's on vacation with the hat backwards. He's never coming back. pic.twitter.com/RUakcwwgtT
